Transparency.findings: GM provides detailed public information on its AI strategy, including transparency in ethical deployment, data handling, and governance frameworks. summary.overallFindings: General Motors Company demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed and verifiable evidence in transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments. The company provides public documentation, technical details, and external validations for its AI systems. No significant gaps were identified, indicating a mature and robust responsible AI program. GM's approach serves as a strong example of responsible AI implementation in the automotive sector.
